title: You Have A Plan, Right?
body:
You Have A Plan, Right?

"Who's there?" Suddenly Evan and Malrak heard a threatening voice and saw two S rank orcs coming in their direction.

Malark's body stiffened when he saw the imposing looks on the orcs' faces meanwhile Evan smirked inwardly and a nervous look appeared on his face.

"You two have been standing here for a long time. What are you two planning to do?" One of the S rank Orcs asked in a commanding voice after stopping a short distance away from Evan and Malark.

Evan adjusted his expressions when he heard the orc and replied in a nervous voice.

"Sir, we have come here to tell you about something we saw a few hours ago while gathering some herbs outside of the city."

The eyes of both of the S rank orcs flashed when they heard Evan and they looked at each other.

'Did he come across a valuable thing while gathering the herbs and want to sell us information about it' Both of the orcs thought at the same time.
